about_the_game:
【Game Features】
Only American style, martial arts masters gather, and various factions are constantly fighting! This is a multiplayer tabletop card game with Chinese style characteristics!

Beautiful deck, simple and easy to use. Pair it with a powerful strategic combination to start a fierce 3v3 duel!

Unique martial arts, with inherent talent. The protagonist knights in the game each have their own unique skills, and each protagonist has unique martial arts and talents! .

Match 3V3 and play quickly. You come from different places and enter into a magical 3V3 game. Each game is not long but extremely interesting.

It’s endless fun to form a team and make friends. The first happiness on the table is to bring two or three friends and drink four or five taels of fine wine. "Sword Fight" is such a martial arts world, a simple and happy game, and encounters in the rivers and lakes are all fate.

short_description: "Sword Fight" is a card battle game based on the martial arts world. Players can play as a mysterious knight in the arena and team up with other players for 3v3 confrontation.
